name: Lucid Software, Inc.
description: Developer of collaborative diagramming and brand management software designed to improve clarity, communication, and productivity. The company's platform includes tools to create flowcharts, mind maps, organizational charts, website wireframes, and network diagrams or design and share other visual content, enabling businesses to share and maximize the impact of visuals or visual content while driving clarity and gaining insights.
one_liner: Developer of collaborative diagramming and brand management software designed to improve clarity, communication, and productivity. The company's platform includes tools to create flowcharts, mind maps, organizational charts, website wireframes, and network diagrams or design and share other visual content, enabling businesses to share and maximize the impact of visuals or visual content while driving clarity and gaining insights.
